titleStmt.title: The Plea of the harmless oppressed, against the cruel oppressor
titleStmt.author: Halifax, George Savile, Marquis of, 1633-1695. A letter to a dissenter.

notesStmt.note: "Replying to Halifax's A letter to a dissenter"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"Includes (p. 13-16) text of declaration against dissenters by Devonshire court of quarter sessions (1683)"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
